label: 関東
本: Edo and Paris:  Urban Life and the State in the Early Modern Era . Cornell University Press . 1994
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: (1) Eastern Japan from Shinano and Tōtōmi to Shimotsuke and Hitachi, (2) the seven provinces immediately to the east and north of the Hakone barrier (Hitachi, Shimotsuke, Kōzuke, Musashi, Shimōsa, Kazusa, and Awa), to which Sagami is sometimes added to make the Kantō hasshū, the Eight Kantō Provinces. [信濃、遠江、下野、常陸、箱根、常陸、上野、武蔵、下総、上総、安房、相模、関東八州]
